resources.string: You can add your LPG connection now!!
Just click on Add button below
Enter best-guess expiry time in days
Click on this image to select latest booked date for your LPG connection
is half done. Click to book your cylinder
You can add a new LPG connection details here.

You will get your Agency phone number details from your LPG provider\'s website, please refer to FAQs section in Home screen menu. \nYou will find your connecton id in your LPG connection invoice or your LPG connection document.\nPlease provide correct details to help in easy re-fill.
You can edit your LPG Booking details below.
Please add a new cylinder connection
You can book for your lpg cylinder refill through call or sms option.
Sure!! You can book re-fill offline by your choice, and provide last booked date in Edit Connections screen from Home page
There seems to be an issue with your connection details. Please try again later or create a new connection
SMS booking facility available only for Indane(IOCL), Bharath Gas(BPCL) and HP Gas(HP Gas).
SMS sent. Please check with distributor for successful booking and change last booked date accordingly.
Hope you had booked your cylinder. Shall we start tracking it then? Click on No if you have not booked, and you can try again later.
Unable to update, please edit last booking date in Edit Connection Page
Unable to retrieve DB, please edit last booking date in Edit Connection Page
Great!! We have successfully started tracking your new booking. We will keep you updated about time to book refill for this cylinder!!
Never mind!! We will inform you to book this cylinder again in a day\'s time
could not be booked in your last attempt. You can try booking it now!!!

Well, you would need to provide permission to us to send and read text messages. Currently, this is not provided. Please let us know if you can provide the access now. Standard call rates / sms tariff would be applicable for appropriate usage from the app.

Well, you would need to provide permission to us to call your cooking gas agency. Currently, this is not provided. Please let us know if you can provide the access now. Standard call rates / sms tariff would be applicable for appropriate usage from the app.
You can revoke the permission anytime from Settings
This LPG booking app is going to help you a lot. You can try!!!
You will be moved out of app to browser
You need to register your mobile number to refill via phone booking or SMS booking option.\n\nPlease select your connection.
Please enter a valid number to call
Please enter a valid number to text
You have not added any connection yet. Please add a new connection.
Please reach out your distributor for registering your mobile number with this consumer id. Mobile based registration is not available for this LPG provider.
Please select your provider and click on button below
SMS registration not available for this provider

string-array.name: Questions
string-array.item: What are the LPG providers supported by this app?
How do I get phone numbers for my agency?
What is the prerequisite to book my refill using phone booking / sms booking?
What is registration of my mobile number for refill booking? Why is it necessary
How to register my mobile number for phone booking/sms booking?
What are pitfalls in SMS booking?

string-array.name: Answers
string-array.item: This app supports phone booking for any LPG provider for which you can get a refill booking number. But, SMS booking can only be done for following three providers - Indane(by Indian Oil Corporation), Bharath Gas(by Bharath Petroleum Corporation Ltd),HP Gas(by Hindusthan Petroleum Corporation Ltd).

We can help you with atleast for three providers among the major players.
 - HP Gas
 - Indane
 - Bharath Gas
You need to register your mobile number with LPG provider. This is a pre-requisite to refill using Phone / SMS option.

Almost all LPG providers require a registration of phone number with which SMS / Phone booking can be done. This is a process by which your LPG provider would identify your LPG connection by mapping it to your mobile number, and hence, LPG provider is able to book re-fill to right customer subsequently. So, before you effectively use booking features in this app, you need to register your phone number. Please read on to understand how to register your phone no.

Please visit options under menu in home screen. You will find detailed documentation about phone registration, with major three providers in links below.
 - Indane Phone Registration
 - HP Gas Phone Registration
 - Bharath Gas Phone Registration

For us to confirm if your SMS booking has been successful, we would need to read your SMS-es. It becomes difficult to confirm success or failure based on SMS for us. Hence, we do start tracking your refill connection even after successful processing of SMS. If your are doing SMS booking, please manually enter your refill book date against your connection in Home page.

resources.string: You will now be redirected away from the app to a browser
You will be able to add more connections by registering as a premium user. Please buy premium version to add unlimited connections and ad-free experience.
Purchase error - please try again later
Service error - please try again later
Network error - please connect to a network
Please ensure that you are connected to a network to purchase.
